effect.ruby_sapphire: Disables the target’s last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.

If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.
short_effect.emerald: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.
short_effect.colosseum: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.
short_effect.xd: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Psychically disables one of the foe’s moves.
flavor_text.emerald: Psychically disables one of the foe’s moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: For a few turns, it prevents the foe from using the move it last used.
